markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swarmeater's Clasp](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2347)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 154 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 460 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A swarmeater's clasp features carved reliefs of verminous, swarming creatures. When you wear the clasp, you gain resistance 10 to physical damage from [swarm](/Domains.aspx?ID=53) creatures.

<document level="2" id="action-1899" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Swarmeater's Clasp
